00032 #include "nsISupports.idl"
00033 
00034 interface sbIServicePaneNode;
00035 
00043 [scriptable, uuid(0e3c0208-72d8-4676-86e1-138db0801586)]
00044 interface sbIBookmarks : nsISupports {
00045   /* \brief Add a bookmark
00046    * Add a bookmark to the service pane. It will be added in the default
00047    * folder. The bookmark's node object will be returned.
00048    * If a bookmark for the given URL already exists then null will be
00049    * returned.
00050    * \param aURL The URL of the page to bookmark
00051    * \param aTitle The title of the bookmark
00052    * \param aIconURL The url of the icon to associate with the bookmark
00053    * \return a new bookmark node or null if the bookmark already exists
00054    */
00055   sbIServicePaneNode addBookmark (in AString aURL,
00056                                   in AString aTitle,
00057                                   in AString aIconURL);
00058   /* \brief Add a folder
00059    * Add a bookmark folder in the service pane.
00060    * \param aTitle The title of the folder
00061    * \return a new folder node
00062    */
00063   sbIServicePaneNode addFolder (in AString aTitle);
00064   
00065   /* \brief Test if a bookmark exists for the given URL
00066    * \param aURL the URL to test
00067    * \return true if the bookmark exists, false if it does not
00068    */
00069   boolean bookmarkExists (in AString aURL);
00070 };
